name: Everything-Demo
description:
This is a demo of the 1st level of EVERYTHING.

Game Overview

The player is a drop of water. Along the way, the player can transform from water into other substances in the environment through interaction.

When players are different form/state, they have different sizes and weights, which triggers different interactions with space.

The player’s goal is to fulfill the mission of a drop of water: they need to face difficulties along the way in order to water a faraway plant. During the journey, the player witnesses the births and annihilations of lives.

Game Theme

Everything is combined and coexisted with each other.

A rose and another rose dwells different souls, a cat and another cat are also separate individuals.

However, they all absorb from the same source of water, all sense the same warmth of sunlight. It’s hard to say that they are not interdependent. 

Just like that, everything in the world is connected somehow.
